forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 38F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
